definitions.definition: A person who holds open the door at the entryway ( entrance ) to a building , summons taxicabs , and provides an element of security ; in apartment buildings , he also accepts deliveries and may perform certain concierge type services.

main_definition: A person who holds open the door at the entryway ( entrance ) to a building , summons taxicabs , and provides an element of security ; in apartment buildings , he also accepts deliveries and may perform certain concierge type services.
